Yes, it was a LOT of effort just for some 'good time', but as far as Jessica thought about it, the added risk just made the reward more desirable. “The Journey is half the fun” She would quote all the time to Allison. Well, tonight was going to be her most interesting journey yet.

She was unable to stifle giggles when she found herself humming the mission impossible theme as she snuck her way across the campus towards the looming brick building in front of her. Once there, she followed along the edge of the building till she came to the small truck loading dock behind the building. Carefully, she slipped a paw into the small laptop bag she had with her and pulled out the hacked security card and swiped it through the key reader. With silent glee, she jerked the door open once the lock's light turned green, and slipped herself inside.

Once inside, all it took was a bit of sneaking up against one wall to avoid a camera, to slip herself into the tiny security station inside. She quickly skimmed across the keys and then looped the film for the next few hours, so that rather than recording new video it would just copy the current video over and over. That way, noone would notice unless they had to go back and look over the tapes... which, if she did everything right they wouldn't have a reason too. And even if they did she wouldn't show up on any of those tapes.

Now that the security was taken care of Jessica could happily prance her way down the hallways towards the lab she was looking for, 4A. Again her hacked card was swiped and granted her access, letting her slip inside unhindered, into the VR room.

She couldn't help but stare in amazement for a few moments. The room only had a single, major point too it, which was the massive pod looking device in the middle of the room. Thick, heavy industrial sized cables as thick around as salamis were strewn across the floor, all connecting to the pod in some area or another, and most of them either disappeared into the walls, or were connected to the large computer sitting beside the pod. Tentatively she waked towards the computer and began booting it up, idly looking over the pods smooth, leather interior and the strange electrode-looking devices around where the persons head would sit. When the computer turned on she quickly started to skim through some of the files, trying to push aside her amazement at how stupidly complex the thing was, so she could get a gist of how this thing worked. She only had a few hours till morning when people would start coming back in, and she doubted shed be able to sneak in again, so she only had this one shot to give the thing a go. She could read how awesome it was on the internet when they went public with it.

Some of the things she was reading were simply mind boggling. How the pod fed information directly into the brain, making things seem almost exactly as real as they would be if they had happened in real life. How you could even alter perception in the pod, so you could make 5 minutes in the real world seem like an hour in the pod. That would make things much, much more fun. With a last few glances at some of the plans and test runs she felt she had a general idea of how the device worked, so she set her bag down beside the computer, and started to climb herself into the pod. It was both invigorating and terrifying as she clamped her arms and legs down into position where the pod clenched onto them to hold them in place, so she didn't flail around unconsciously, as the design specs had said. A faint yipe of surprise escaped her lips as, once she was settled the electrodes pushed down along her forehead and against the back of her neck. An electric tingle shot down her spine, and her eyes rolled into the back of her head... and she passed out.

“Ooh, what happened...” She groaned softly, rubbing a paw across her forehead as she started to push herself up into a sitting position. Her eyes slowly slid open as she started to wake up... and saw white. White as far as the eye could see in every direction. There was no ground, no sky, no people, buildings or... anything. Just, White. Well, white, and her. She was in an entirely empty space void of everything. For a second she started to panic. Oh god. Was she dead. Had the pod killed her?! Then quickly rationality started to take charge and she remembered what the test runs had said. This was what they called the 'construct'. The empty zone that the VR computer generated before any specifications had been added.

She took a deep breath to calm herself, heart beating wildly in her chest from the sudden brief terror that had overtaken her. “Ok. Calm down now Jessy... you got this. Lets get to work.” She murmured, starting to giggle to herself in anticipation. She raised a paw up and then spoke aloud in the clearest voice she could “Console!” and immediately a small floating holographic keyboard and screen seemed to simply fade into existence beside her, right at the tips of her waiting fingers. “oooh... this Is so awesome!” she giggled aloud to herself, as she started to type along the floating keys. She wish she'd known about this first, she could browse the database in here just as easily as she could outside. She was rather surprised to see some of the details that had been pre-programmed into the system already. They had uploaded everything from three dimensional schematics of most major cities in the world, to the psychological profiles of most of the university students in here! According to the test logs they used them as 'bases' to build models, environments and 'characters' for the environments. That just made it all the easier for her, Now she didn't have to start from scratch.

In here, she could do just about anything she wanted. She could recreate most of the people she knew, or make entirely new people... generate cities, fantasy settings... whatever she wanted. The only question was.

Where should she start?

The settings for the gun only further confused her, as she looked looked at the various numbers it could be set too. Ranging from the lowest to highest 1/100, 1/50, 1/20, 1/10, 1/2, 0, 2, 10, 20, 50, 100.

Jessica's eyes went wide and her jaw hung slack as she saw an aura of green energy begin to engulf the brown furred teddy bear sitting on her desk, then began to slowly stretch and push outwards. It was as if it was pulling the teddy bear with it, as with each inch further outwards the aura expanded, the teddy bear grew with it. It was growing!

the normally 6 inch tall toy was rapidly approaching a foot in height, then two, then four with no signs of slowing. Bigger and bigger it expanded, starting to push pencils and keyboards off of her desk as it ballooned larger than even she was. When it finally seemed to stop, the teddy bear's head was squished against the ceiling, as the now 10 foot tall teddy bear was taking up the majority of her desk!

The fox simply sat there on the edge of her bed for several seconds staring with wide eyes at the now giant sized teddy bear, slowly glancing back down to the object held in her hand. A size ray. a real, working size ray! A wide grin slowly spread across her face as ideas began floating through her head. A real Size ray! Assuming the numbers were the shrink and growth settings, she could do a lot of things with this. The only question was what to do with it first...

Allison is a big girl. This is the first thing everyone sees about her, it's just unavoidable. Dragons are usually considered stereotypically the largest anthro species, though technically the average Brontosaurus is bigger than the average dragon. Allison is neither of these, and that makes her immense size all the more unusual. Not that T-rex's are known for being small, but its not everyday that you see a Tyranno towering over Dragons and bronto's alike, making them both look short in comparison. Hell, Allison was lucky she could even stand upright in most buildings, considering the average ceilings are between 8 and 8 ½ foot tall, herself being just a tad over the 8'2” mark (though if asked, she will argue heavily that shes not an inch over 8 foot tall, embarrassed about her height)

She was a shy girl even in her early childhood before she hit puberty, finding herself spending more time alone than she did with the other kids. When she got into high school, and puberty hit, she became the center of attention in school, much to her self conscious protests. She went from a petite, thin girl only about 5'6 or so, and shot upwards over the course of three years, gaining literally over a foot in height each year until her puberty started to taper off when she neared 18 and her senior year.

More than just her height had exploded on her, however. Her metabolism slowed and altered slightly, leaving her a bit less able to easily process all the sugary treats she found herself guiltily enjoying all the time, having quite the sweet tooth. Small layers of fat spread across her body over the years, though nothing too major, as she constantly Jogged to keep herself fit. It ended up sending most of the fat centering around her already rather curvacious green fleshed hips and buttocks, making them even plumper and thicker (Redefining 'ghetto booty'), and into her chest. That being another reason she drew so much attention. Even considering her over 8 foot height her chest was absolutely enormous. So massively thick and broad that if she raised her arms up you could see her bosom spilling out to either side of her back, noticeably wider than the rest of her torso was. She had to special order all of her bras in order to get them in the right size and proportion, as the only ones commercially available that were even close to fitting, were for less 'tall' people, and the straps ended up being too short for her to hook them onto herself, and when you have tits that could rival your own head in size, having proper chest support was a requirement.

Overall she became quite the curvacious bombshell, that sent all the other women in the school grumbling in envy, and all the guys drooling and wolf whistling every time they saw her. Which only made her situation worse considering, despite her massive change in size she was still the same shy, bashful girl that she had always been. Finding herself muttering and stuttering shyly when the football team would hit on her, despite the fact that she could probably kick any of the player's asses, herself, if she tried. The only person she seemed at least somewhat comfortable being more herself around, was Jessica, who to this day neither of them can figure out how they became friends. They just met one day and just started... hanging out. That being a mixed blessing considering Allison's shy demeanor, and Jessica constantly dragging Allison all over town, trying to force her constantly into social settings.

But tonight, its a different situation that shes going to be getting into, one she would never have expected.

But before we look into tonight, let us look on how it all began for Allison, looking to the morning...

Allison was NOT a morning person, and to her ever-lasting annoyance, Jessica was as her teasing tone and extremely vocal volume would arrouse the great jurassic beauty from her slumber, blearly glaring down at her alarm clock, sighing at that it was indeed, very late into the morning or in the still half fuzzy mind of the rexgal, too early...still, she would finally rise from the bed as her energetic roommate thumped her fuzzy little fists into the door, not letting Ali rest. So, with a resounding thump-thump as her broad, bare feet dropped onto the floor, Allison's great jaws opening with a great yawn, her body letting out pleasant little pops and crunches as she stretched out, her barely held back bosoum bousum, and her round rump shaking with the swish of her tail. She would be reaching for her bedroom door, a bit more awake and now an annoyed snarl in her throat, not one who wishes to be roused from her slumber so noisely as Jessica LOVED to do to her...but as soon as she swung the door open, the t-rex gal would blinkblink at empty air at where her impish little vixen of a roommate would be...but wasn't to be found.

Allison would look to her left and then to her right, straightening up while scratching her left cheek, confused at where Jessica had gone. She had just been there...but then, Jessica was a speedy little gal. But either way, Allison did sigh in relief at the brief reprieve she'd been given by her friend's sudden disappearence and walked off, great green bare feet thumping the wooden floor, unimpeded to the bathroom...and really hoped Jessica wasn't home, because as soon as that bathroom door closed (and locked. She checked...TWICE), and her clothes were gone, the hissing hot waters which greeted her bare curvatious form. Just the heavenly wake-up call she needed, her cheeks blackening with color of embaressed pleasure as she would let the water cascade along her large but lovely form, tail swishing as she scrubbed her smooth scaled form thoroughly, though lingering then she would as she rubbed her hefty breasts, pressing them together and...well, lets say that shower went from basic cleaning to a long, and very soothing process to get clean...and a little dirty. Though, for a gal like Allison, she was still blushing long after the shower itself was over and had toweled herself off. However, she counted to herself as she wrapped her custom towel as tight as possible as she would unlock the door, half expecting the vixen to pop out and tease and...

No one was waiting on the other side of the door

She stopped, peering down the hall, to where the front door was...and saw a large brown-paper wrapped package sitting on an end table...and its allure drew Allison from her bedroom, pulling more and more, until she was looking down at the package in question, great watery footprints following behind her. She'd raise an eyebrow ridge down at a small note which had been placed down onto the package...yet smirked as she found the flourishing handwriting of Jessica, whom Allison can't help but imagine is giggling during each word is said, her trickster nature shining through in her wording...

Heya Alli-Saurus, Jes here.
Had to get going, got people to go, and places to meet...strike that, reverse it. Anyway, this big beast of a box was on our front door step, and it was addressed to the house, and since I hadn't ordered anything, didn't wanna bother ya with the details and just thought it was yours, so, here you go! See you later, Alli-Gator...oh, and if there is anything kinky in this box, be sure to share with me later! -Jessica

Allison couldn't help but chuckle and smile at her friend's written words. Despite constant teasing and jokes, the vixen meant well, and though Allison found her behavior both extremely childish and even weird, she couldn't wish for a better friend. With that said, the t-rexess's eyes now fell upon the brown package itself. Jess was right, and their address was on there, yet it didn't designate whom it was supposed to go to, and she certainly order anything herself.she didn't even recognize the company which had sent it "ArchSoft". Allison, a distinct chill running up her body, became very self aware...especially when she felt her towel lightly flutter agaisnt a gentle breeze, her bare scaled bum buns shivering as they were nearly naked to the elements, if only by the grace of the towel. She turned to quickly race back to her bedroom, not knowing if Jessica would choose this time to return home, and with but a towel on, Allison knew the vixen would require little else as ammunition. But, with one green sole hanging in mid-step, Allison's eyes held onto the box and with a grace which would cause intense jealously amongst the musclehead footballers, tucked the box into one arm, and folded the other over her chest, and soon, she was but an emerald blur, and the door of her bedroom would slam shut, and Allison, bracing the door shut with her towering t-rex frame, sighed in relief.

Tossing it onto her bed, Allison let her towel drop without a care, her bountiful, bouncy body was a sight to behold, but as she stood, frowning at the closet, trying to come to decision, she just kept looking over her shoulder, back at the freaking box, and without any fore thought to the actual recepient, she tore away the wrapping and lifted the brown cardboard lid of the mailing box and gaped at what awaited her within the padded contents of the box.

Skinny Cow sprang to mind with the gnashing of teeth. Though, she always had enjoyed citrus drinks. She licked her lips, feeling very thirsty...

The T-Rex tensed her sore muscles and looked at her hands as the wave of vertigo passed, seeing her entire body cloaked in a green aura that was the same color of the beam that hit her. She could see the aura pulsing inward towards her scales. What didn’t see was the fact that each pulse, her body compressed in with it, shrinking her all around. She did feel, however, her entire body tingling and the overwhelming dizziness. But as soon as the dizziness started, it stopped.

“Woah…” she gasped, seeing the green glow still pulsing around her form, like a green angelic glow, or like radioactive waste in those cartoons. Allison really hoped it wasn't radiation. Just when the idea of it being a gun that shoots out pure radiation and she should go see a doctor, she took one step and realized something was off about the entire room. It looked, bigger, and was still getting bigger!

She watched with stunned silence as her feet dragged against the carpet, the width between them growing smaller, and her head creeping away from the ceiling. She could stand at full height for once. She straightened her back as a few things on the wall rose higher and higher. Her heart was racing. Was this really happening? She was shrinking, no longer a super massive beacon of embarrassment.

She got to 7 feet tall, then 6 feet, back to a normal height. The room looked loads bigger. She took this moment to sit down, enjoying the room. But it wasn't finished, even at 6 feet she was still shrinking, her feet slowly pulling off of the floor as she shrank to 5 feet, then down to 4'1". The couch was massive now, where once her entire ass would take up nearly 2 and half of the cushions on the couch, she took up barely one of the three cushions. She leaned back and closed her eyes. It was oddly relaxing, knowing she wouldn't be the center of attention any more.

It was like her entire body, for the last few years had been tense and had suddenly just relaxed, a huge weight off of her shoulders. No more apologizing for her ass bumping against people, or having to crouch underneath doorways. She could finally be a bit normal!

She felt the shrinking stop, her back and head weren't dragging against the couch any more. She couldn't touch the floor with her toes, just out of reach. That fact alone gave her goosebumps on her scaly hide. Slowly opening her eyes she took a minute in silence to gawk at her new perspective.
This thing, this gun, was amazing, able to make her this small. Luckily for her, the clothes she was wearing had shrunk with her, so she wasn't walking around her house nude. Her figure remained, still a heavy ass for her size and large breasts stuffed into her shirt. After the minute, she picked the gun back up and looked over it. She saw that the cylinder had been set to 1/2 and the cylinder was back in its normal setting, not spinning freely.

She immediately got up. There was a sudden and incredibly pleasing lightness to her step. No more thuds as she walked around, feeling like Godzilla. She made circles around the coffee table. It was almost addicting.

Then, the idea of looking at her room made her heart flutter. She got up and ran, holding the gun. But as she got to her door the door knob, what would be easily accessed by an 8 foot tall Allision, was now nearly unreachable. She tip toed up to it, her fingers juuust able to pull on the lever of the handle and turn it, letting the door open into a familiar, yet alien room.

She had always kept a tidy room, sheets made, no trash on the floor, everything in its place. Now, it was more like a playground than a bedroom. She grinned as she walked up to her bed, able to rest her chin on the edge without bending over. With a smirk, she opened her closet door. Everything was out of reach and too big for her. She’d have to pull on the bottom hem of shirts just to get to them, and those were the ones that were hanging on hangers; there was no way at her current size to reach the top shelf.

Her computer desk and chair were massive, having been custom made to fit her wide rump and immense size. She couldn't see the top of her desk any more, and just to get in her chair would require climbing.

She had to show Jessica, one way or another. She could either go find Jess at school, maybe try out her new size out, or she could stay at home and wait for Jess to get home. Or, another option, was to wait for Jess at home and then ambush her with the size ray. What would she do?

Allison, a the shy and gentle Rex girl was in her apartment, doing what she liked to do most: lying on her bed and enjoying a good fantasy novel. It had everything she liked. Dragons, knights in shining armor that... Just so happened to be some rather kickass ladies... And a ton of very detailed descriptions of food. The bed of course was less pleased with having to bear the weight of the voluptuous rex and creaking noises where heard whenever she shifted her rather large form.

She sighed a little as she looked at the time on her phone. The daily reminder would go off soon. Just like every day, Allison was dreading it. But her roommate challenged her into it and now she couldn't just back out. The big curvy rex grumbled a little. How did she ever get talked into this? A lazy finger poked the phone on the table in annoyance. Probably because it was good for her and as much as she hated to admit it, she would never get to it on her own.

Just as expected, her phone sprang to life on the table, buzzing at her and making sounds. The face of her roommate, Jessica, appeared on the display and the words "Get moving! Time waits for no one!" - Allison sighed and quickly pressed the button labeled "Dismiss". Oh well, a deal is a deal and this Rex was going to honor it!

Allison sat up on the bed and stretched. It had become routine by now, but she still had to push herself every evening to go out on her run. Due to her curvy body, she rather early decided to choose a path that was a little less populated. Mostly because her form in motion tended to be very... Distracting for onlookers everywhere. While Jessica encouraged her to "go all out" and "show off what she's got", Allison quietly selected a different path to jog on every night. Of course it was considerably less safe and lead past the chemical lab close to the city outskirts but... For a little peace and quiet, she was willing to take that little detour.

What our green-skinned protagonist did not know was that in this very night, something sinister was about to happen in the chemical plant. Something that would make this day one that she, and probably the entire city, would not soon forget. As her heavy footsteps shook the ground a little, her chest heaved despite the proper bra and her heavy breath was visible in the dimly lit night, she noticed something rather strange. An unmarked, white van was outside the chemical plant, and for a moment or so... She thought she saw the shine of a flashlight in the distance.

Curiously, Allison started to approach. After all, maybe it was just some kind of delivery. She never really had to be afraid of anyone. Given her stature, most people where afraid of her. And probably for good reason, too. Admittedly, she always was curious what was going on in that lab. She wanted to be a chemical engineer some day, a "nerd job" as her roommate described it colorfully.

At her rather impressive height, the truck's roof was actually shorter than she was, so she just elected to peek over the roof as she approached. On the other side, two people - you could only really call them 'crooks' - where running down the way towards the van. Allison let out a surprised 'eek!' and quickly crouched down behind the van, quickly reaching for her phone. She had to call... The police! Or maybe Jessica! Or help in general or...

She couldn't really finish her thoughts. One of the crooks, who was on his way to the van, ran around it to get into the passenger side, only to slam right into the crouching massive rex. It wasn't exactly unpleasant for him - after all, she was almost the definition of soft - but the robber was caught off guard. Allison could feel a small vial of liquid crash against her chest and eeked again, crawling backwards and away from the two.

"Crap! I lost it! Where did she come from?" The unlucky-lucky crook shouted. His accomplices replied right away. "Forget it! We have to get out of here!" Only a minute at max later, Allison saw the van leave, still sitting on the floor, feeling her heart pound in her somewhat damp chest. She looked down. What on earth happened to her?

"THE SISTERS!? YOU SCORED WITH THE FUCKING TWINS!? Dude, NO one's been able to pick up one of them, much less BOTH of them..."

Burton let out a roar of laughter, clearly prideful of his teammate's great success, and without a though, slapped the big black furred wolf's broad back with a great resounding thump, meant to be a measure of congratulatory machismo. What Burton HADN'T expected...was Fang to stumble forward beneath the sudden blow by the bear. Burton blinked. He hadn't thought he put THAT much power into his slap on the back, looking at his large hand, flexing the fingers before looking back...and up at a very pissed off looking Fang, eyes burning bright and teeth bared in a snarl. Burton held up his hands in reflex, his fur practically losing several shades of color as he stammered.

"S-sorry, Fang! I-I meant to pat you on the back! S-S-Sorry man!"

Fang would take a step forward, and Burton took a few steps back...but Burton would just stand there as Fang took a deep breath, expanding up and out to even larger looking proportions...only to deflate as he let out a calming breath, the bear beginning to breath again as well as he would wipe his brow as the fury he'd seen diminished to just frustration and annoyance...which was vented by a suddenly slug to the brown bear's left shoulder, practically numbing it on contact. The bear yelped and whined, rubbing his arm as Fang would turn suddenly, and stomp off to his house, which was not too far off from the pair. Burton would scowl after the wolf, muttering

"Jeezuz man, you didn't have to punch me that fucking hard...not my fault I don't know my..."

Burton stopped and looked after the looming lupine, making yet another observation. Normally, Fang's clothes were in the body hugging, "practically painted" on style, the wolf being known to leave very little to the imagination, being of the "flaunt it if you got it" mindset, but right now, from his jacket, to his pants, and even his shoes, seemed to be slightly lax on him, seeing wrinkles in fabric here and there. Shortness of breath, eskewed sense of balance, weight loss? Maybe the wolf was getting sick. Burton then slapped his hand on his face and made a disgusted face.

***

Fang snarled as soon as he slammed his front door behind him, his back still tingling from that fuzzy fatass's lumbering blow. A flick of his fingers and the belt was undone and tossed onto a doorknob, landing perfectly. Stretching out, Fang began to pose for his own pleasure, bones and joints a popping as he reached down and undid his jeans, pulling them down all while scrunching his large socked toes, slipping the jeans off. He tossed them aside without caring where they landed...not at all noticing how easy it was to slide his pants down. "Well shit...stretched another one out...ah well..."

It was off and flung onto a lamp without a second thought, leaving him in just his old socks and a pair of tight red boxer shorts, which he murrled in a mirror, posing and flexing quite a bit, as it would accentuate his firm backside and definitely brought attention to his hefty wolfmanhood, which he would of course, stroke and fondle, mmmming. Still quite a hefty piece of wolfmanmeat in his hands. Though, he frowned, something was...off. He couldn't put his finger on it. Shrugging, he made his way to the kitchen, but as he made the reach for the kitchen door handle, he tripped! Snarling, he looked down...and saw his old socks seemed to have gotten a bit stretched out as well. They were definitely called "old" for a reason, darkened by sweat and stains, and hole-y, but it would appear that the elastic had finally lost the battle, as the socks seemed to bunch a bit at his ankles, and even a bit of extra fabric beyond the toes. Huffing, he reached down and tugged them off, flinging them to the trash bin, scoring two perfect baskets with each one. Flexing his large sweat bare furred feet upon the cold tiled floor, he would pull the kitchen door open and snatch himself a can of beer. Thumping off to the living room, dropping down onto his couch with a thump, mmmming as he popped open the can, kicking his meaty heels up onto the coffee table before the couch, airing out those damp behemoths he called his wolven soles, mmmming as he found a nice warm buzz already rushing through his mind as he tipped back the second can. He wasn't drunk yet, oh far from that, but combined with his exhaustion and odd sense of fatigue, the addition of alcohol was helping lull the big black furred beast to slumber...which he would begin to nod off, but not without a brief mental pause of contemplation...awfully literative a description when concerning Fang, but still.

He was feeling so tired, so exhausted, so weak...was he sick? And something else was wrong...something...off balance...off scale? He looked at his boxer shorts and looked down with a sleepy eyebrow. He would reach down, a thumb claw hooking upon the hem of the boxer shorts...and tugged on it, seeing that there was some slackness...but the wolf's mind was overridden with self-pleasure as the other fingers rubbed upon his bulge...and with that, Fang drifted off, half emptied beer can in one hand, other gently cupping his own lap, the big black wolf went to sleep with a big ole grin on his fuzzy muzzle. But Fang was in for quite a surprise...or more appropriately, quite the rude awakening when...

151122.content:
...He stirred with a shiver, the big black wolf sitting up on his couch, huffing the air reflexively, before his great jaws would open wide, his sharp teeth bared in a great and mighty yawn, stretching his body out on the couch, mmming as his arms and legs pulled themselves out, his arms going passed the head rest on one end, his big broad bare feet pointing clawed toes passed the foot rest. Although, as it did, the still sleep fuzzy mind of the wolf did not recognize that his limbs rested forearms and mid-calves comfortably on those ends...and not over flowing, as his knees sometimes hung off, toe claw tips etching along the floor often when he crashed on the couch. Either way, he would rise from the couch, not notcing (of course) the delayed "moment" before feet met floor but he'd rise and scratch at his bare black furred backside, licking his chops as he made the trek to the bathroom for a nice, long shower...not at all registering the slightly loose boxer shorts he'd worn to slumber before had fallen to his "big" feet...and he'd stepped out of them without a single mis step. Of course, as sharp as his fangs were, his mind was not exactly as honed as his body.

And speaking of which, the football hero would stop in the hall, posing for a customized full body length mirror, flexing and pumping his muscled form, clearly not minding to show a bit of self-love. He was quite the specimen, his body well-cared and hard-worked physique, as well as blessed by fantastic genetics...most of the time. For you see, the customization of the mirror in question was that it was made to show off the entirety of a 7'10 superwolf rippling with muscle that would make Rob Liefield scribble like mad...and the wolf currently showing himself off was still packing plenty of muscle to make any football recruiter sit up and watch with rapt attention...but at 6'5'' and a physique which was certainly bigger than average, he wasn't as "super human" as he USED to be. But, ignorant to how he no longer filled out his special mirror as he used to, the big black wolf thumped off to the bathroom, bare ass shaking...but even his ignorance had limits.

Fang's dawning realization to something being not entirely right began as he slipped into the shower, reaching reflexively for the shower handle...which wasn't there. He blinked and scowled, a bit more awake, seeing the handle in question...slightly higher then he reached for. Grunting with amusement, Fang shrugged it off and turned the shower on, murrring deeply as hot water basked him in its heat, making his body sing its pleasures...while providing his own, murrrling as he stroked his claw tips along his laps, the soaking shaft pulsating with long lasting morning wood, murrrling...long after when the shower was turned off, and the now dripping wet wolf would step out, unable to fight back instincts and shook himself off, which dried him off partially...but he reached for a towel, beginning to wipe himself...and certainly took his time polishing off his throbbing wolfwood, not sure why it felt especially good today...so good, he felt a great throbbing shiver shake his entire body. It was like cumming again and again, his fingers clenching on his wolf wood while his toes squeezed his big feet into fists, but yet, he had not came at all...but for one moment, he felt so much pleasure, he thought he mind as well have!

Perhaps because the towel in question, another item made with the big bad wolf in mind, felt odd agaisnt at a smaller lupine's form...and especially good down there. Either way, the naked Fang would pad off to his bedroom, to finally get dressed...as much as it felt good to get his own jollies off, the sooner he get dressed, the sooner he might someone else to help get him off. He was grinning toothily when further evidence of something not entirely right with his world presented itself. Now, it should be noted, that as many items he's had customized throughout the home, the house was not made for him in mind, and so was on an average sense of scale...and that said, he always had to duck when clearing the way to his bedroom...but this time, his ears didn't even brush at the top of the doorway. He paused and gave it a scruntinizing look...and huffed, rubbing his scruffy furred chinned, tossing the towel on his bed...and stopped between bedroom door and dresser...and just stood there in his bedroom, scowling all around. The now freshly clean and more "aware" wolf would look all around...and knew that something was not right. Though he knew not the right words to properly say it, he could tell that his perspective, so long used to a certain way, was NOT as it should be. And he huffed with great annoyance as he would reach out for his underwear drawer and selecting a pair of tight red boxers, he would slip them on...and that very moment was when Fang's unrecognized fears became fully realized...

...As those shorts began to slide right off of him without any hold what so ever...

"What...the fuck...?"

He growled and tugged them up. Now, he KNEW that these boxer shorts were brand new, and show still be quite tight in hold and elastic. But as he kept hiking them up, they kept sliding down his lap and his thighs...before he stopped and tugged them up, holding them...and notice that the hem of the shorts was well passed mid thigh...and looking closer to knee. He held the shorts out slight, noticing the significant gap in wide, clearly showing that these were for a wolf of far larger size. But these were made especially with someone like him in mind, and if he didn't fit in them...

He let the shorts drop as he suddenly yanked open a drawer and grabbed a simple white tank top and put it on...and was shocked to find it too did not fit well on him. It held, but instead of body hugging and leaving little to the imagination, it wore baggily on him...and he blushed as he felt its hem stroke lightly along his still stiffened member, while a better expanse of his chest was shown around the neck. This too, was supposed to be a shirt made for him, it was supposed to be body hugging, not hanging off on him. Somehow, he'd either gotten a size bigger then his or...

He was smaller. Like that, the dominos fell as it all came together. His clothes not fitting right, the doorframe being bigger, the shower handle higher. His room...it was bigger and wider then normal...or, more to the correct point, he was smaller and shorter then he should be.

The big bad black wolf would let the shorts drop and in just the baggy tank top, he would run down the hall and after some fervent searching he would collect a tape measure, and a black felt marker. Standing agaisnt a wall, he'd mark the tip of his head where it lay, and hurriedly measured the mark...and with a slack jaw and bulging eyes, he read a measurement of Six Feet Tall. Six Feet Tall EVEN. He'd nearly lost two feet in height...and after looking himself in the mirror, he could watch with dawning horror that his height wasn't the only thing he'd lost. His godlike muscle tone had suffered, dropping passed demi-god and now looked more in line to "semi" god of muscle, but barely even that! What the fuck was happening to him...and was it still happening? Was he STILL shrinking? The wolf could not bare to even think of that. It was a living nightmare to be just this small, to be so far from what he used to be, to even imagine he could get even SMALLER. Fang felt the urge to throw up, but swallowed it down dryly, rubbing his eyes as he would pace about the mirror, stopping to look at himself in the mirror and double check his height. He was still Six Feet Even...but for how long? What could he do? He'd dare not leave his house, less someone he knew saw him and then his life would otherwise be completely over...

For that moment, he began to think of every woman he'd used, every jock and teammate he'd schooled and tackled, every other person he'd taken advatage of over his entire life...and shuttered, knowing for once, he might no longer be in control...and that scared the HELL out of him. He needed help. This was so beyond his realm of knowledge and understanding, he knew that even under threat of humiliation and pain, his salvation would be in someone else's hands, cause he had NO fucking idea where he should go from here. But, before that, he had to get dressed, cause going out like this was bad enough. Going out naked? Not happening.

It took him a good part of two hours to put something together, and it certainly pained him terribly to do so, seeing how big his clothes were on him now, but soon, as he finally stepped out of his house, he'd come up with an outfit which would fit him for awhile, and would help disguise him: A white muscle shirt which had gotten shrunken in the wash fit him with some tightness but not as much as he'd like, a pair of boot cut jeans which hugged him in a few places but were still long enough in the legs to rest on his feet, which were currently clothed in a few layers of socks, stuffed into the smallest pair of black sneakers he had. But the crowning part of his disguise was a pair of shining black mirror glasses, biker's cap, and black leather jacket, pieces of a costume from years ago, in middle school where he'd given drama a chance, playing Felix in Ducktails and Bobbysocks...and it though the jacket was loose, it fit him perfectly. But, as good as it was, he grabbed his wallet and as much loose cash as he had in the house in case of new clothes, among other contigencies. Dipping the cap over his sunglassed eyes, the six foot "greaser" of a wolf quickly marched from his "big" house, and quickly made his trek to a possible cute ot his condition...and where he thought he'd get the help needed would be...

1511221.content:
With his options before him, even for someone like Fang (who practiced his brawn over that of his brain), he could clearly see that that Tyler's shop is the logical choice (well, as logical as someone like Fang could be). His reasoning being, out of anywhere in town, Tyler's shop was the least likely for him to bump into anyone who was anyone, be that one of his "friends", a teammate, or one of his many "conquests", and this whole situation REEKED of all that scifi fantasy crap David's little brother sold...and if it WAS the little purple weasel's work, he's going to get his size back, even if he took his pound of flesh from the drake's own purple scaled hide!

And though the trek from his house to Tyler's store was free of any "surprises" run-ins, Fang was VERY self-concious of the world around him. It seemed to him as if everything had finally caught up to him in growth. No longer did he tower over the crowd. No, now he walked amongst them, LIKE them. And Fang HATED it. A powerful sense of weakness and belittlement weighed down on him. He had no control over anything now, and it terrified him to his core at being stuck like THIS...or worse!

Fang snarled as he slammed his hand upon Tyler's front door, the force of which thumped open agaisnt a wall as a choked jangle of a jingle servicing as the welcome/exit bell. This act did attract everyone's attention to him...and Fang basked in it. A very prideful person, the wolf devoured attention like his feral ancestors devoured their prey. Bearing his infamous namesake fang, bursting with pride, he strode in as if he owned the place (as per usual to his behavior under normal circumstances, anywhere...ever!).

But this time, instead of a proprietor smiling shakely and fearfully beneath his great shadow, the guy working the register raised an eyeridge and huffed out sardonically up at the (at this point) larger lupine. "Okay, I'll give you points for the vintage cosplay, but the next Rocky Horror Picture Show Midnight Event is not till Halloween, "Eddie"..."

Fang's good mood died the instant he heard that as his fang was now bared in a snarl...while Tyler looked up at the wolf, not at all recognizing him apparently, looking at him up down, expecting some threat or reaction to come forth at his verbal jab. The purple dragon was currently flipping through a copy of Astro City, dressed in what appeared to be baggy jean shorts, black high top sneakers with socks rolled down over the top, a copper-grey over shirt with a black turtleneck beneath it. He'd begun to look back at his comic book when the wolf just stood there, but Fang slammed a large hand, palm down and leaned in, slipping the mirror glasses down to show his eyes to the dragon, hoping a bit more of his features might help "remind" the purple dragon who he was fucking with. "Funny, Tiny Ty, funny...now are you done playing Comic Book Guy, and going to give me some service..."

Tyler froze in mid-page flip and looked up at the wolf with a suspicious glare "No one calls me Tiny Ty but..."

Fang grinned, baring that fang again, and Tyler's eyes widen and sat up and pointed a finger up at Fang, who was grinning wide and proud as Tyler said "You've GOT to be related to Greggory Nanthaniels! You must be one of Fang's cousins, right?"

If he were at full strength, Fang would've been in fear of giving himself a concussion as he slapped a hand on his forehead, removing the hat and glasses before leaning in, hissing a whisper as everyone's attention was back to their possible purchases, only wanting Tyler to hear. "STOP being a diminuative dumbass for once, and LOOK at me! I AM Fang..."

Both wolf and dragon were glaring daggers at one another as both were getting really mad as Tyler's eyes darted around the wolf's form, grunting, while the bell was ringing in quick succession as most of the customers left the store, feeling the heat rise in the room quite rapidly. "Well, I admit, even for a relative, you'd be a pretty spot on Fang...if you were a couple feet taller, a couple dozen pounds heavier and beefier, and an even bigger asshole, you'd be his identical twin!"

"Dammit ,Tyler, I AM Fang. I came here hoping to get your help cause I'm somehow SHRINKING! And since shrinking falls somewhere in your scifi fantasy bullshit..."

"Look, you might be Fang's cousin, but you keep talking about my livelyhood like that, and I'll kick you out myself, you mouthy bastard!"

"GODDAMMIT TYLER, I'M GOING TO RIP OUT YOUR TH-..."

But before the threat was fully made, Fang gasped and pressed his hands flat onto the table as Tyler watched at first with confused agitation...then slowly dawning shock as he began to watch the large wolf begin to literally shrink before his eyes! The six foot tall wolf would curse inwardly as he felt the same intense pleasure like when he first stepped out of the shower pulse through him, his fingers digging into the glass countertop, crackes forming as his claws dug deep...while he sank down. His eyes were shut tight as it felt so damn good, his pants to be so damn tight with his arousal if he did not feel them loose on his legs and hips, his jacket feeling heavier as he lost five more inches of height, as well as even more muscle mass, looking now more like a buff swimmer or a really muscled minded olympic runner.

Either way, when it was all over, the wolf now standing before the register was even further from how Fang was supposed to look, as Tyler just gaped at the now 5'5'' black furred wolf, dressed in fifties style greaser wear which had been slightly loose before, but nearly too baggy to be fashionable on him down. He was barely bigger then Tyler himself now. Fang was still scowling, unable to look Tyler in the eyes as he just waited for it, knowing full well that Tyler was going to laugh his scaly tail of, and embaress the wolf further. Fang was a shell of the super wolf he'd been. Hell, through all that pleasure, he hadn't even came! Out of all that, he didn't even get THAT satisfaction!

But when no snarky reply came, Fang looked slightly down to see Tyler staring at him with a smile...but not a sneering cruel smirk...but a genuine amazed grin beaming that for once in his life, he'd just seen the impossible right before him. "You...you just shrank..."

"Yeah..." Fang sighed, feeling extremely weak and tired suddenly.

"You...JUST...shrank!"

"Yeah...I know, I've been shrinking, didn't I say that before?"

"YOU JUST..."

"TYLER!"

Tyler stood up and shook his head, clearing his mind. "Right right right. Focus. This...this is WOW...I mean...shrinking! Thats...thats like a super power!"

"Yeah, real fucking amazing super power, ONE WHICH I CANT CONTROL!"

"Right, right, you mentioned that...hmmm...what could have made someone like you shrink like this..."

"Why're you asking me, I came to ask y-"

"Just thinking aloud, sorry...hmmmm..." Tyler rubbed his chin as he leaned in over the counter...and smirked "Perhaps...those mega steroids you've been taking are beginning to wear off finally?"

All Fang replied is with a very furious snort. He might be smaller, but Tyler knew when to stop kidding and shut up. "Alright...now, how does one get shrunken..."

"Pym Particles?"

Both lupine and dragon would turn to see someone who'd been standing there waiting for a little while, a number of comics in hand. Fang would wince as he had to look up at this new guy, another wolf...who now was four inches taller then him, and nearly had the same musculture as him, though his fur was lighter grey and a far more leaner muscle, wearing a Silver Agent t-shirt, and baggy blue jeans with a pair of white and blue sneakers. He smiled at the black wolf without any hostility and looked between him and Tyler. "Sorry, I don't often but into others conversations, but I sort of read a lot of those kinds of comics..."

Tyler would smirk and nod at the patron, recognizing him from many trips before "Yeah, you would, wouldn't you? Alright, first of all, Pym Particles are a fictional substance..."

"True...Shot with any strange lookign ray guns?" Fang shook his head.

"Accidental Chemical Spills?"

"I think we would have heard about that on TV..." Tyler butted in.

The grey wolf rubbed his chin , and shrugged "Piss off any gypsys lately?"

Fang's ears perked right up and slammed his fist into his other hand, "The old zebra from last night! She did this to me!"

The grey wolf beamed as Fang seemed to perk right up, trying to recall everything from last night while the other wolf set the comic books on the counter, Tyler ringing them up and handing them off to the other wolf, who looked at Fang's baggy clothes with a smile. "Like your duds, daddy-o. Though my own cosplay kinda falls back on the Noir 30s. See you Ty!"

Fang would get in front of Tyler before the dragon could wave one of his favorite customers good bye. "We need to find this gypsy bitch, and get her to change me back!"

Tyler winced, "Uh, go up agaisnt a gypsy who actually HAS magical powers, enough to curse a big dog like you into a shrimp? I think we might need to consider our options for another solution...either as a cure, or something to use on this gypsy...say, there is this store claiming to have real magical items and such...perhaps something can be found there!"

Fang huffed and crossed his arms, not convinced...but as he thought about his two choices, either chase down the gypsy or follow Tyler to this magic shop, Fang took a deep breath and said...

Minutes later...

"Come on Fang, I got to lock up the shop. Just come on out, no one is going to recognize you by this point unless you keep acting up like this!"

"Dammit Tyler, are these the smallest clothes you have in this place!?"

"Look, I said I had some backup clothes, not my entire closet, so YES, those are the smallest I have. Its not myself you're losing mass as well as size!"

A snarl emitted from the store, but soon, the "big" black bad wolf stepped out, not looking too pleased. And well, it was understandable. The sneakers, similiar black and white high tops to the drakes on, had a bit of room to them but fit him still, but not helped as the wolf had to bare foot it, so there wasn't extra padding to keep them on better, grumbling why the drake didn't have any extra socks (He did, but Tyler wasn't telling). The jeans held on but had too much fashionable bagginess then he would've liked but at least he could carry his wallet and other items in the many pockets. And though there was a semi-tight black t-shirt beneath it, the baggy white and red hockey jersey made him feel even runtier, the sleeves having so much room yet short enough they rested somewhere mid-forearm, while the torso hung loose over his jeans. But otherwise, the wolf was at least dressed properly and not hindered by the clothes. He was not at all happy, but he was going to have to just DEAL. Either way, he shoved his hands into his pockets and slouched, pouting like a sullen teenage wolf pup, which given his size and looks, might be a pretty convincing look. Tyler stood up straighter at an odd little noise he could swear he heard from the wolf.

"Are....are you whimpering?"

Fang stood up, and back arched in offensive stance. "What the fuck you say!?"

Tyler held up his hands, smiling weakly

"Easy, easy...look, I'm sorry, okay...I didn't mean to egg you on more...though I might regret saying this aloud cause well, you were a pretty big ass jerk when you're normal sized, but I guess it might not be ENTIRELY fair to have something like physical being slowly chipped away..."

"Damn fucking straight...." Fangn odded fervently.

"However..."

"NO, No fucking however. It ISNT Fair!"

"Oh Really? Tell me Fang, what good did you do with your size and muscles?"

Rich comes from a low income neighborhood, and from a family of eight. He always had to fight for everything he ever earned in the world, never receiving much in the way of support from his parents or many siblings. At an early age, he had to turn to crime in order to make ends meet for his family. Rich spent years honing his craft, becoming a master in the field of theft, burglary, pick pocketing, larceny, robbery, and stealing of all sorts.

His appearance is about as generic as could possibly be for a raccoon, very skinny with the standard fur pattern, which gives him the added advantage of being difficult to track amongst other raccoons. And at only 5 feet and 6 inches tall, he is plenty able to get into some smaller places for his sneaky business. As a child, getting into fights with his siblings taught him that he wouldn’t always win with strength alone. So he developed smarts, and a silver tongue to go along with it.

As an adult, he has taken to attempting bigger and bigger crimes, hoping to either make a name for himself in the world of theft, or get himself out of poverty. He always has a plan, and a backup plan in the back of his mind, even in the most mundane of situations. He currently stalks all manner of museums, banks, and science labs, eavesdropping and slinking around to get all the latest gossip about treasured artifacts or armored car deliveries. Rich is beginning to get a reputation as being sleazy due to all his lurking, which isn’t entirely unwarranted as a thief.

Sometimes, Rich wishes that he didn’t have to spend his life stealing. It would be much easier if he just didn’t have to worry all the time about money and food. He longs for a free life, without fear from the cops, and wants to be able to do whatever he wishes when he wishes to do it. At one point, he even attempted bodybuilding, in the hopes that gaining some muscle mass would help him fight off muggers and other thieves around his neighborhood (or at the very least help in his constant wrestling matches with siblings), but he never was able to produce any results. If only some stroke of good luck would come to him, Rich would seize the chance in a heartbeat and never look back. For now though, life continues to get him down. He won’t complain out loud about his desires, so long as he continues to avoid capture... but it’s always in the back of his mind.

Today is a big day for Rich, he's planning a big job! But he doesn't realize that this particular crime will leave his life changed forever...

1541.content:
Tonight was the night, the raccoon kept repeating to himself as he made his way back to the college. He was taking a big risk being out this late in his neighborhood given the constant muggings that had been going on in the area, but the risk was going to be well worth the reward. If tonight’s job was successful, all his problems would be over. This crappy area and all the low life’s who inhabited it would soon be a distant memory.

Earlier in the day the coon was doing his normal rounds around the campus. He had started volunteering on campus hoping to, not only to get some easy cash from a wallet or pocket, but also to get the layout of the area and building itself. There had been rumblings around town for days that the science department was up to something big, and big to this thief usually translated into expensive. Hearing that this mystery object was being tested out today Rich made his way towards the east wing of the campus where he heard a loud commotion coming from a lab down the hall. His pace quickening, the nimble thief slipped into the room and ducked behind one of the various tables in the room. Raising his head the coon saw a group of students and professors clamoring over what looked like some sort of sci-fi ray gun with a large dial on the side. With a light groan the disappointed raccoon shook his head unable to believe he had wasted his time. The thing looked like it was a prop from an old alien movie or something, yet these egg-heads were acting like they had just found the cure to the common cold. He watched as they carefully pointed it at an apple sitting on the counter. Chuckling, he started to make his way quietly out of the lab. They acted like the thing was going to actually fire!

A buzz quickly filled the room as the coon’s attention was quickly pulled away from making his exit. A beam quickly came out of the ray’s tip, striking the apple dead on. Quickly diving back to his spot Rich watched on was the ray eventually cooled down. The room was completely silent as everyone present stared at the fruit. Then after a few seconds it did the most unbelievable thing…

It started to grow

It slowly seemed to build up and up keeping the same shape but taking up more of the counter until it eventually came to a stop, topping off at the size of a fully grown watermelon. The students and professors let out various yells for joy, shock hands, and gave many other forms of congratulations while Rich sat on the floor in the back of the room. He figured whatever was being made in the labs would fetch him a few bucks to a rival group or something, but this…it seemed impossible! Assuming this simple gun could shrink things as well, this group could become famous! They could single handedly solve world hunger, shrink down massive object and transport them wherever they pleased; the list went on and on! They would make millions if not billions in a matter of days…and with that thought a devious grin slipped across the raccoon face. Making his way out he waited on the side for the group to come out of the lab. They were still congratulating each other, riding high on success, to notice the coons hand slip into one of their lab coats pulling out an ID card.

Fast forward to tonight as the thief finally reached the campus grounds. Security was light surprisingly enough given what treasure was being held inside the building. Still the coon wasn’t going to complain as he jumped over the fence and made his way up to the east wing. Making sure the coast was clear Rich came to the door of the science department. With a quick wish the coon slipped out the ID and placed it in the reader. With a quick beep the light when from red to green as the door unlocked. Grinning, he opened the door slightly and eased it back, not wanting to take the chance of it slamming shut. Crouching down the coon quickly went back to the hall and after another swipe of the ID he was in the same lab from this afternoon. As his eyes adjusted to the dark the coon made his way to the back his heart increasing in speed as he spotted a silver briefcase on the counter.

Unable to contain his excitement the thief flicked open the two locks on the side and flung open the case. There it sat nestled in by the spongy material of the insides. Letting out a nervous laugh the coon grabbed the handle and lifted the ray out to give it a look over. Nothing seemed to have changed from this afternoon, the design still looked ridiculous but now getting a closer look at the dial Rich spotted a “G” and “S” that it could be set to. It didn’t take long for him to figure out what those stood for as he kept looking the device over. Such a goofy looking thing yet it held so much power. The raccoon’s head raced with thoughts. Who would he sell this to? For how much? What WAS he going to do with all that money? Lifting his head up from the gun the coon smiled at the thoughts, only to catch himself in a window reflection. Taking a good hard look at himself he gave a light sigh. Sure, for most he seemed like a perfect size and height, but to him it wasn’t enough. He had lost count of the number of times thugs from the neighborhood had beaten the crap out of him, taking what little he had at the time. His eyes drifting back to the gun he looked at it long and hard. Maybe he didn’t need to sell it off just yet. Maybe he could test it out a bit first…see how it worked with a live subject….

15411.content:
"Of course," Rich said aloud, smirking at his own reflection, "I only see one available live subject right now. Guess it'll have to be me." He lowered the safety, then brought the gun up to his chest, placing its barrel squarely between his slender pecs. He then closed his eyes, his finger resting on the trigger. But before he could bring himself to fire, a sudden panic gripped him. "Wait a minute, what am I doing?" he asked himself. "I mean, just because this thing works on an apple doesn't mean that it'll work for me. What if it kills living creatures or something crazy like that? I mean, it is kinda screwing with the laws of physics..."

He started to bring it down, just as he saw a fly buzz past, landing on the countertop in front of him. "Hmm," he thought. "I suppose it wouldn't hurt to test on this little guy to see if it's safe. I'll just make sure it's on the lowest setting possible." Glancing down at the dial, he turned it from 4, where it was at, down to 1. "Okay," he said, holding the gun out and aiming at the fly, "Hope you don't mind a bit of an experiment, little guy."

He fired, a dim beam of light shooting out and hitting the counter around where the fly had come to a rest. "Did I hit it?" Rich wondered. Indeed, the insect didn't even seem like it knew anything had happened, but as it took off again and flew out of the room, the raccoon could swear that it had gotten just a tiny bit bigger. Or maybe his eyes were just playing tricks on him. "Well, that was a bust," he sighed. "Screw it, I want to know. I'm sure if it was harmful the apple would've exploded or something, like in that movie, right?"

Keeping the dial set at 1, Rich pointed it once again at himself, took a deep breath, and squeezed the trigger before he could have second thoughts. The beam hit his chest, a warm, tingling sensation spreading through his body, not altogether unpleasant. "Ooh, this isn't half-bad," he murmured, grinning. Looking back up at his reflection, he waited several seconds to see any signs of growth, either visual or otherwise.

Just before he had given up on seeing any results, he felt the fabric of his shirt start to grow tighter around his shoulders, and looking down at his feet, he noticed the hems of his pant legs were now a couple of inches above his ankle, well higher than they had been. Glancing back up, he saw that his belt line was now level with the counter, whereas before it was several inches lower. "It worked!" he exclaimed softly. "I've grown, a few inches at least! I wonder why it didn't grow my clothes, though?" He thought about it, then shrugged. "Maybe it only works on organic material, who knows? Still, this is a toy I think I'd much rather have some fun with before selling."

The raccoon grabbed the briefcase but stuck the gun in his pocket, making sure to engage the safety before doing so. Turning to the door, he glanced through the window, making sure the coast was clear before opening it and sneaking out...

154111.content:
... And immediately regretted using the window. The moment he pulled the window upwards an alarm started blaring through the building! The window must have had a sensor on it to tell when it was opened after hours!

Cursing under his breath, Rich quickly clamored his way out of the window and onto the ground below. Already he could feel that he had been slowed down considerably by his new 5’10” size. It wasn’t so much that his larger size made him slower, but the fact that all of his clothes were now a bit too small were causing them to pull tight at all the joints and restricting his range of movement. Despite this he struggled on to dash down the side of the building, heading for the residential street behind the university.

Unfortunately for Rich, by the time he got to the end of the alley between the two buildings, he could hear the crackle of a radio and see a flashlight sweeping across the grass ahead. The campus security had already caught up with him, looking for whoever set off the alarm. The raccoon’s tail whipped around him as he pulled a quick 180 on his heels and started to run back in the other direction. He reasoned that everyone would expect him to be heading for the nearest escape from the campus, so no one would expect him to run deeper onto university grounds. With that thought in mind he made a B line for the mostly unlit quad in the middle of campus.

By the time he got to the middle of the quad he already knew he had screwed up. He could see flashing blue and red lights lining the edge of the campus, blocking off that exit. Behind him the campus security was sweeping in from between the various campus buildings.

He was trapped

Glancing back and forth between his two blocked escape routes, he tried to think of a way to get out of this. He couldn’t run, Fighting was never an option and he certainly wasn’t going to turn himself in. Then, an idea struck him. Tentatively the raccoon reached back behind him, shirt stretching across his chest from the movement of his arm and torso, and wrapped his fingers around the handle of the size ray. When normal plans don’t work, it’s time to get creative…

“What about Corporal Rosette?” The bury bear growled out softly. Head slowly swinging from side to side as he looked out of the 4th story window of the military research complex, watching drill sergeants marching new recruits around the compound. One of his paws idly reached down to scratch at the thick globe of muscle and fat that strained the front of his uniform, Typical border-lining on stereotypical of his Ursine heritage.

“Erm... let me see..” the mouse murmured, raising the large tablet computer held in his arms and starting to sort through files on it. His tail occasionally twitched somewhat soradipcally out behind him, shifting the fabric of the large white lab coat that he wore. “Top of her class in hand to hand combat, excellent marksman with both large and side arms. Blood type works out... Psychological profile.. mmm... that ones a bit iffy. Shes shown aggressive and confrontational tendencies, border-lining on insubordination before, though she got off because the drill sergeant was deemed being 'too demanding'? Whats that mean?” he asked, looking up curiously at the thick bear of a general beside him.

“They were drilling the new recruits that were in the same squad as her, shortly after she joined. Sergeant got a bit over zealous when one of the recruits fell down in the mud. Plopped a boot on his head and ground his face down into the mud till the kid couldn't breath. So she grabbed him, and flipped him halfway across the field. He got pissed, and tried to attack her, so she broke his nose. We'd had some problems with him before, but we let him go after that. The kid nearly suffocated from being ground into the mud like that.” He explained with a bit of a smirk, clearly amused by the concept. “The other recruits got a kick out of seeing her kick the sergeant’s ass though. I think she's a great choice.”

“If you say so sir...”

“So what exactly did I get signed up for again?” Sam grumbled a bit, arms lazily crossed behind her head as she followed the scrawny mouse down the corridors into the research facility. The pose did little to hide her ample endowment or hard muscled curvature of her body, and seemed to keep the mouse in a constant state of fluster, which seemed to only amuse the looming 6'8” wolfess. She'd never gotten to actually come into the facility, hell no one really did. At least, none of the recruits. The closest she had ever come was seeing a truck delivering barrels of something at the loading dock, and getting a peek into the loading bay.

“To summarize” The mouse replied, occasionally stammering a bit, and constantly keeping his eyes averted away from her immodest form and demeanor. “Basically. We've chosen you for psychological and physiological reasons to be the first test subject for Project Titan, an experimental project with the intent of creating a new line of super soldiers. And yes, we know the name is a bit cliche... the think tank that came up with it thought it would be funny to name it something out of a cheesy movie.” he continued, quickly tacking on an explanation at the end to preempt any taunting at the name.

“I mean. I know you already told me about that stupid clause in the contract when I signed up... but do I really have to do this?” She murmured, glancing down at him and lowering her arms. “You're not gonna turn me into some kind of wolf hulk thing are you? Cause, if you haven't noticed-” She paused, grinning as she slid her paws down her sides, along her taunt abs and then across those plump, muscular hips and thighs in an obviously provocative gesture “-I like my figure.” She clearly was enjoying further flustering the already nervous and blushing mouse. And it wasn't exactly hard to make someone as, even slightly, timid as him, blush and stutter with a figure like hers, and with no shame at showing it off.

“Er... I ah... um... n-no... at most there might be a mild increase in visible muscle mass, but the primary function is to increase overall size, muscle density, and bone density. You'll be taller, stronger than you would be normally, and your body will be more durable as well.” He explained, adjusting the large rimmed glasses sitting on the edge of his nose. “I-its actually fairly simple. we... er.. we use nanobots, tiny machines that will be injected into your bloodstream, and then when they're given fuel, in this case food, they will use the nutrients to start adding to your muscles, bones and body to enlarge and enhance it. “ He finished.

the mouse pushed open a door into a large empty room. Though at second glance she realized it was the loading bay, and whatever had been stacked in it had either been moved away, or pushed against the far wall, leaving her in a roughly 30 foot tall room about half the size of a football field. In the middle of the room was a large wooden crate filled various high nutrient foods and bottled water. At second glance, the two could see a small 'observation' box settled in one corner o the room with large windows looking down into the loading bay. Though the distance made it hard to make out through the windows, Sam and the mouse could both see shapes moving around inside of it.

“Now, we're going to inject you with the nanites, and then give them the activate command. Once that happens, you'll become very, very hungry. So we've prepared some food for you to eat to fuel the process.” He explained, gesturing to the crate of food, as he picked up a small silver box sitting beside it. He punched in a code onto the small keypad on the box, and with a faint hissing it slid open, revealing a hypodermic injector gun filled with what looked like a thick, silvery goo.

“What did I just tell you about my figure” Sam joked as she grinned down at the crate full of food. Though her demeanor faltered ever so briefly when she saw that needle. She'd never admit it out loud, but she'd always hated shots. With a sigh she pulled up the sleeve of her camo T-shirt “Let's just get this over with” She growled out softly. Her fingers curled into a fist and she barred her fangs in response to the gun suddenly stabbing a thin needle into her arm. Normally such a device made injections all but painless. But it felt like they were shoving something solid into her arm, as that thick gooey silver substance forced its way into the vein along her arm. You could actually see a small bulge under the flesh of where it was seeping in, before the 'goop', actually thousands if not millions of tiny machines, started spreading out through the rest of her body.

When it was over she finally unclenched her fingers and raised her other paw to grip where the needle had injected her, finding herself inexplicably panting a bit. Why was she so suddenly out of breath? The mouse stepped back a bit when she let out a rumbling growl... that she didn't make. At least, she didn't think she did, till she realized it was her stomach grumbling, loudly. She gave a faint groan when she felt a light cramp shoot through her abs, clutching at them out of reflex and grasping the edge of the crate for support

“Oooh... god damn, you weren't kidding about the hungry thing” She huffed out a bit breathlessly. Slowly her eyes trailed over to the crate full of food, practically salivating at the sight of it. Within second she was snatching up energy bars, dehydrated food, and bottles of water out of it, stuffing her face with as much of it as she could get her hands on. Despite her shoveling the food down her throat she never seemed to ever get full. If anything, it felt like she was just getting hungrier. Bite after bite, mouthful after mouthful pouring down into her belly where nanites immediately tore it apart and began using it to 'build.

The mouse took a step back as he saw Sam start tearing into the food, blushing a bit at the glutenous display. He glanced up at the observation booth and gave a nod in its direction, before a tearing sound pulled his attention back to Samantha. He saw the sleeves of her T shirt, already rather snug around the firm curve of her bicep, starting to tear open as her arm started becoming thicker. Her military pants were pulled skintight around her legs and riding up well past her ankles, and her bosom looked like it was ready to tear the front of her shirt open.

He could hear a series of loud POPS as her expanding footpaws began popping the laces of her boots open, then tearing the sides apart as they outgrew the thick leather. Sam let out a soft groan of relief when she felt the shoes give away, the pressure having been rather uncomfortable, borderline on painful before they were free. Her shirt started to tear down the front and back as the width of her torso and the girth of her chest became too much for it, and within seconds it was splitting apart and exposing her massive tits, straining her pitifully undersized bra to the point that the straps snapped, and that too fell uselessly down to the ground.

Already she was cresting the 10 foot tall mark, barely even seeming to realize what was happening too her as she continued shoveling more and more food into her mouth. Her muscular thighs tore her pants apart and left her in just a pair of now skintight black boxers that soon shredded apart along with her pants, leaving the 12 foot and growing wolfess now stark naked. Each second brought more food into her mouth to be swallowed (soon not even bothering to unwrap it anymore!). And with that, brought the nanites more fuel to work with... and with that, brought more and more size to the growing giantess of a wolf.
